What Does This App Offer?

Taxi Car Simulator: EVO is packed with features that make it a must-have:

  • Realistic Driving Experience: Drive through dynamic city environments with realistic traffic and weather conditions.
  • Passenger Missions: Pick up passengers, follow GPS directions, and drop them off to earn in-game money.
  • Car Customization: Upgrade and customize your taxi to stand out.
  • Open World Exploration: Explore a vast city full of hidden surprises and challenges.
